body_html:
Well, it depends on what will be included in 0.9.0 release. At the moment I see that the 0.9 branch doesn't contain this fix. A bit of inconvenience, but what can we do.

The solution on our side is to create our ufcnn with a fixed length of signals (which sort of contradicts sequence-to-sequence paradigm). But it is better to discuss it not here.

body:
Well, it depends on what will be included in 0.9.0 release. At the moment I see that the 0.9 branch doesn't contain this fix. A bit of inconvenience, but what can we do.

The solution on our side is to create our ufcnn with a fixed length of signals (which sort of contradicts sequence-to-sequence paradigm). But it is better to discuss it not here.
